asignar_estancia(inquilino_id: int, estancia_id: int)¶

Parameters:

  • estancia_id (int) – The ID of the estancia to assign the tenant to.

Returns:

A dictionary with the status of the assignment operation.

Return type:

dict

consultar_disponibilidad(id: int, numero_personas: int)¶

Checks the availability of an Estancia for a given number of people.

Parameters:

  • id (int) – The ID of the estancia to check.

  • numero_personas (int) – The number of people to check availability for.

Returns:

True if the estancia can accommodate the number of people, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

Returns:

Return type:

app.controllers.usuarios.verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str) → bool¶

Compare the plain text password with the hashed password.

Parameters:

  • plain_password (str) – The plain text password.

  • hashed_password (str) – The hashed password.

Returns:

True if the password matches, False otherwise
